O3: Unusually sensitive people should consider reducing prolonged or heavy outdoor exertion.
PM2_5: Unusually sensitive people should consider reducing prolonged or heavy exertion.
PM10: Unusually sensitive people should consider reducing prolonged or heavy exertion.
NO2: Unusually sensitive individuals should consider limiting prolonged exertion especially near busy roads.

O3: People with lung disease, such as asthma, children, older adults, and outdoor workers should reduce prolonged or heavy outdoor exertion.
PM2_5: People with heart or lung disease, older adults, and children should reduce prolonged or heavy exertion.
PM10: People with heart or lung disease, older adults, and children should reduce prolonged or heavy exertion.
CO2: People with heart disease, such as angina, should limit heavy exertion and avoid sources of CO2 such as heavy traffic
SO2: People with asthma should consider limiting outdoor exertion.
NO2: People with asthma, children and older adults should limit prolonged exertion especially near busy roads.

O3: People with lung disease, such as asthma, children, older adults, and outdoor workers should avoid prolonged or heavy outdoor exertion; everyone else should reduce prolonged or heavy outdoor exertion.
PM2_5: People with heart or lung disease, older adults, and children should avoid prolonged or heavy exertion; everyone else should reduce prolonged or heavy exertion.
PM10: People with heart or lung disease, older adults, and children should avoid prolonged or heavy exertion; everyone else should reduce prolonged or heavy exertion.
CO2: People with heart disease, such as angina, should limit moderate exertion and avoid sources of CO2 such as heavy traffic.
SO2: Children, people with asthma, or other lung diseases, should limit outdoor exertion
NO2: People with asthma, children and older adults should avoid prolonged exertion near roadways; everyone else should limit prolonged exertion especially near busy roads.

O3: People with lung disease, such as asthma, children, older adults, and outdoor workers should avoid all outdoor exertion; everyone else should reduce outdoor exertion.
PM2_5: People with heart or lung disease, older adults, and children should avoid all physical activity outdoors. Everyone else should avoid prolonged or heavy exertion.
PM10: People with heart or lung disease, older adults, and children should avoid all physical activity outdoors. Everyone else should avoid prolonged or heavy exertion.
CO2: People with heart disease, such as angina, should avoid exertion and sources of CO2 such as heavy traffic.
SO2: Children, people with asthma, or other lung diseases should avoid outdoor exertion; everyone else should reduce outdoor exertion.
NO2: People with asthma, children and older adults should avoid all outdoor exertion; everyone else should avoid prolonged exertion especially near busy roads.

O3: Everyone should avoid all outdoor exertion.
PM2_5: Everyone should avoid all physical activity outdoors; people with heart or lung disease, older adults, and children should remain indoors and keep activity level slow
PM10: Everyone should avoid all physical activity outdoors; people with heart or lung disease, older adults, and children should remain indoors and keep activity level slow
CO2: People with heart disease, such as angina, should avoid exertion and sources of CO, such as heavy traffic; everyone else should limit heavy exertion
SO2: Children, people with asthma, or other lung diseases, should remain indoors; everyone else should avoid outdoor exertion.
NO2: People with asthma, children and older adults should remain indoors; everyone else should avoid all outdoor exertion.
